description.value:
The purpose of this profile is to define a representation of the Australian Immunisation register notice an individual has an exemption record, or has finished a National Immunisation Program schedule.
#### Must Support
In the context of this profile [Must Support](http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/conformance-rules.html#mustSupport) SHALL be interpreted as follows:
* The system SHALL be able to store and retrieve the element
Except for the following elements:
* subject
for which it SHALL be interpreted as:
* The system SHALL be able to take the element into account when performing processing

short.value: An Australian Immunisation Register notice for an individual

definition.value: Australian Immunisation Register notice that an individual has an exemption record, or has finished a National Immunisation Program schedule.
